A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Every addition to the franchise just makes the whole thing that much worse at this point. There are so many plot holes\, inconsistencies and unresolved points that it weakens everything that came before. It's a mess. Please just stop. \n\nFor all of that it looked sort of cool and by the end of the film I sort of cared what happened to the characters. Not so much that I will be eager for the next installment.
